# com.apple.developer.endpoint-security.client

**Property List Key**

The entitlement required to monitor system events for potentially malicious activity.

## Discussion

You must request this entitlement from Apple. For information about how to request the entitlement, see [https://developer.apple.com/system-extensions/].

If your app or extension lacks this requirement, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/EndpointSecurity/es_new_client(_:_:)] fails with the result [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/EndpointSecurity/ES_NEW_CLIENT_RESULT_ERR_NOT_ENTITLED].
title: com.apple.developer.endpoint-security.client
